title: Patch 7.24b login error 003
body:
Hello all!I tried to login to the lol oce servers today and kept getting the error code 003.I followed the guidelines to solve this issue and tried using the hextech repair tool too.I also tried full repair and reinstalling the game but the problem still persists.It keeps showing the message:"Something's up with our server and it's preventing you from patching."

Can someone please suggest a solution.
Thanks

replies.body:
Error Code 003 usually points to a connection issue. I would suggest checking on your [firewall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) first and making sure everything is squared away there.

If fixing your firewall doesn't help, switching to a public DNS or flushing your DNS could also help fix your Error Code issue, which is also found in the [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5).

Those two steps usually help fix that issue! If you're still seeing that Error Code message pop up, let's see if our Tech team can help out [in a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Keep me posted on what happens, and hopefully things get fixed soon! :D
